mapper.update: UPDATE student_score SET student_score.`姓名` = #{name}, student_score.`平均分` = ((#{math}+#{chinese}+#{english})/3.0), student_score.`数学成绩`= #{math}, student_score.`语文成绩`= #{chinese}, student_score.`英语成绩`= #{english}, student_score.`作业成绩`= #{homework}, student_score.`成绩等级`= CalLevel((#{math}+#{chinese}+#{english})/3.0*0.6+#{homework}*0.4) WHERE student_score.`学号` = '${id}'
